Package com.mlt.ml.graph.nodes

Class ActivationNode

java.lang.Object
com.mlt.ml.graph.Node
com.mlt.ml.graph.nodes.ActivationNode
public class ActivationNode
extends Node
An activation node, can have only one input edge and one output edge.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Activation activation
    Activation function.
    private double flatSpot

      public void initialize()
      Eventually initialize the node internal data. This method is called after a new network is built, not when a network is restored.
      Specified by:

      public void validate()
      Validate the internal node structure. This method is called both when a new network is built or when a network is restored.
      Specified by:
      validate in class Node
